title: annotation collabration: annotator got entire dataset instead part of it
body:
when i created a annotation task, i included two annotators, but when each of them log in his account, he saw all the data not half of it. 

Please see the picture below. Please let me know if I set the config wrong. 
admin task settings:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/18476272/113139562-dba99200-9259-11eb-97f6-f1f6711424b2.png)

entire task, only include 12 documents 
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/18476272/113139604-e9f7ae00-9259-11eb-8acf-8918dee63712.png)

number of annotator: 2 
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/18476272/113139671-01cf3200-925a-11eb-914d-4fa7577b74b8.png)

The annotator see 12 records instead of 6. 
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/18476272/113139753-1ca1a680-925a-11eb-9c3c-a3fadf63c617.png)

*   Python Version Used: python 3.6
*   When you install doccano: 2021-3-31
*   How did you install doccano (Heroku button etc): pip install
